verses.name: Luke 10:27
verses.text: And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself.

verses.name: Luke 10:28
verses.text: And he said unto him, Thou hast answered right: this do, and thou shalt live.

verses.name: Luke 10:29
verses.text: But he, willing to justify himself, said unto Jesus, And who is my neighbour?

verses.name: Luke 10:30
verses.text: And Jesus answering said, A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho, and fell among thieves, which stripped him of his raiment, and wounded him, and departed, leaving him half dead.
